content: out on your right needle before every row will always be knit 2 the last 2 stitches of working your next stitch every row will always be slip 2 stitches with yarn in front sl2 wyif » if you are new to slip stitches or in need of a refresher see slip_stitch help on page 8 gridster cowl © 2022 lynnell koser page 2 yarn hero fiber arts | www yarnhero com instructions row 11 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l sl2 wyib k1 to 2 sts before m sl2 wyib sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif row 12 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib setup p1 to 2 sts before m p2 sm sl2 wyif with color a co 35 stitches repeat section one four more times for a total of 5 ws with color a k2 pm k1 p1 x4 pm p to 2 sts repeats before end pm sl2 wyif join color b section two section one begin chart 2 or continue with written instructions below begin chart 1 or continue with written instructions there are only a few small changes in this section which below calls for a sl2 wyif instead of a sl2 wyib these changes row 1 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l sl1 wyib k2 to have been marked in red so you do not miss them m sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 1 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l sl1 wyib k2 to row 2 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm p2 sl1 m sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif wyif to 3 st before m p3 sm sl2 wyif row 2 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm p2 sl1 row 3 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l k1 k1 sl2 wyib wyif to 3 st before m p3 sm sl2 wyif to m sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif row 3 rs using a k2 sm k2 m1l k1 k1 sl2 wyib row 4 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyib to m sm k1 sl1 wyif to m sm sl2 wyif p1 to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif row 4 ws k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 5 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l k2 sl1 wyib to 2 p1 to 4 sts before m p4 sm sl2 wyif sts before m k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif row 5 rs using b k2 sm k2 m1l k2 sl1 wyib to 2 row 6 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif sm p2 sl1 wyif to 5 sts before m k2 sm sl1 wyib p1 to m sm sl2 wyif sts before m p5 sm sl2 wyif row 6 ws k2 sm k1 sl1 wyif sm p2 sl1 wyif to 5 row 7 rs
